title: Node-Notifier internal properties
description: Some internal properties created and managed by Node-Notifier. You shouldn't modify this file unless you really know what you're doing!

fileCreated.description: Timestamp of when this file was created

initVersion.description: The version of Node-Notifier that has created this file

lastNotification.description: Timestamp of when the last notification was sent. Is set to `-1` if no notification was sent yet.

latestRemoteVersion.description: The latest version on the remote (GitHub). Is set to `null` if no version check was done yet or no release info is available.

remindUpdate.description: Whether Node-Notifier should send a notification reminder when an update is available
